text: Anders Blomquist (born 17 October 1960 in Bromma, Sweden) is Swedish former cross-country skier, competing for IFK Lidingö and Åsarna IK at club level. In 1988, he shared the Vasaloppet victory together with his brother Örjan Blomquist.Forsberg, Anders (6 March 2010): "”Det var helt fantastiskt”". Aftonbladet.se 6 March 2010. accessdate=28 July 2013. For many years, he has been an SVT commentator during skiing events. Until March 2010, he was the CEO for Destination Funäsdalen. == References == Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish male cross-country skiers Category:Vasaloppet winners Category:IFK Lidingö skiers Category:Åsarna IK skiers
title: Anders Blomquist
